items.sentence: Tom and Mary were able to figure it out on their own.
Tom and his friends played hockey on the frozen pond.
He made up his mind to jog in spite of his blindness.
No one else noticed that Tom had snuck into the room.
I can\'t believe I let you talk me into volunteering.
Only the fools and the dead never change their minds.
Tell Tom that I\'m going to do that as soon as I can.
The first stage of the mission has been accomplished.
I think you should do everything Tom tells you to do.
You were supposed to be with Tom yesterday afternoon.
